policies.title: Policies and guidelines
policies.subtitle: To guarantee a comfortable stay for every guest we keep our policies simple and transparent.
policies.contact: Our team is available via email at
policies.sections.house.title: House rules
policies.sections.house.summary: These guidelines help keep the stay comfortable for everyone.
policies.sections.house.item1: Check-in is available from 3:00 PM and check-out by 11:00 AM.
policies.sections.house.item2: Respect quiet hours between 10:00 PM and 8:00 AM.
policies.sections.house.item3: Smoking is prohibited inside rooms or common areas.
policies.sections.house.item4: Only registered guests may access the property unless authorised by the host.
policies.sections.health.title: Health & safety
policies.sections.health.summary: We prioritise cleanliness and wellbeing throughout your stay.
policies.sections.health.item1: High-touch surfaces are sanitised daily and rooms are ventilated after each checkout.
policies.sections.health.item2: Contactless check-in is available upon request.
policies.sections.health.item3: All staff follow updated health and safety protocols.
policies.sections.health.item4: Emergency assistance is available 24/7 at the front desk or via WhatsApp.
policies.sections.cancellation.title: Cancellation policy
policies.sections.cancellation.summary: Plans change—review the timeline below for refunds and changes.
policies.sections.cancellation.item1: Free cancellation up to 5 days before arrival unless otherwise stated in the listing.
policies.sections.cancellation.item2: 50% refund if cancelled within 48 hours of arrival; no refund on the day of check-in.
policies.sections.cancellation.item3: Date changes depend on availability and may adjust the nightly rate.
policies.sections.cancellation.item4: Contact our support team to review exceptional cases or documentation.
